content.query:
CREATE DATABASE ServerlessSQLDB;
GO

USE ServerlessSQLDB;
GO

-- Run in ServerlessSQLDB

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT CSVFormat 
WITH 
(   FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT
,   FORMAT_OPTIONS  
	(   
		FIELD_TERMINATOR   = ','
		, STRING_DELIMITER = '"'        
        , USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE
        , FIRST_ROW  = 2
    )
);
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [ParquetFormat] 
WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET, DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec')
GO


CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE MyDataLake_jenil
with (
      LOCATION ='https://jelazaradlsgen2.dfs.core.windows.net/synapseadls'
);  
GO


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.ExtractYellowTaxiData
WITH 
(  
    DATA_SOURCE = MyDataLake_jenil,
    FILE_FORMAT = ParquetFormat,
    LOCATION='raw/bigdata/YellowTaxis.parquet'    
) 
AS
SELECT 
    [vendorID],
	CAST ([tpepPickupDateTime] AS DATE) AS tpepPickupDate,
	CAST([tpepDropoffDateTime] AS DATE) AS tpepDropoffDate,
	[passengerCount],
	[tripDistance],
	[puLocationId],
	[doLocationId],
	[rateCodeId],
	[storeAndFwdFlag],
	[paymentType],
	[fareAmount],
	[extra],
	[mtaTax],
	[improvementSurcharge],
	[tipAmount],
	[tollsAmount],
	[totalAmount]
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK    'https://azureopendatastorage.blob.core.windows.net/nyctlc/yellow/puYear=2019/puMonth=*/*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'parquet'
    ) AS [result];
GO
